title: Ben Affleck says he's 'dating' again and jokes about using the exclusive Raya app in charity tweet
text:
Ben Affleck has confirmed he's dating again, via Twitter.

The 47-year-old Gone Girl star took to the social media site on Saturday morning to make a wry reference to reports that he's been using the exclusive dating app Raya.

'HA, you got me. I'm dating,' began the actor's tweet.

Back in the game! Ben Affleck has confirmed he's dating again, via Twitter

However, the Justice League star soon used the social media shoutout to signal boost his favorite charity.

'But let’s be serious for a moment and talk about something that is actually important,' continued Ben.

'I have been in recovery for over a year and part of that is helping out others,” he went on.

'The Midnight Mission is an incredible organization that helps those in need with housing, training, development and recovery.'

Maroon man: The 47-year-old Gone Girl star took to the social media site on Saturday morning to make a wry reference to reports that he's been using the exclusive dating app Raya. Seen here in March 2019

He's got a type: The star - who split with ex-wife Jennifer Garner in 2015 [the couple seen here on the left in 2013] - was said to be hunting for a normal woman with a career out of the entertainment business on the app. Ben and Lindsay Shookus seen here on the right in 2017

Ben then went on to name check the app he's used to find women in the past, according to Us Weekly.

'I’m making a donation today because there are people battling addiction every day that don’t have the resources and need help,' he concluded.

'Raya, you in? Who else is with me?'

The star - who split with ex-wife Jennifer Garner in 2015 - was said to be hunting for a normal woman with a career out of the entertainment business on the app.

A source had told Page Six: 'He seems to want a real partner and is not looking to date a celebrity. He is private and is in a good space right now.'

Bennifer! Before his marriage to Jennifer, Ben was in a romance with his Gigli co-star Jennifer Lopez from 2002 to 2004. Seen here in 2003

It was continued by the source: 'He has his kids and is focusing on work, but is ready to be in love again.'

However, it has now been claimed that the Batman actor, who has enjoyed a number of short-lived flings since his divorce from Alias star Jennifer, is no longer on dating app, Raya.

DailyMail.com has contacted representatives for Ben for further comment.

Ben was previously married to Jennifer for 13 years, with the couple splitting in 2015 and their divorce finalized in 2018.

Ancient history: Before that he romanced Gwyneth Paltrow for three years from 1997. Seen here in 1998

The former lovebirds share three children together - Samuel, 7, and Seraphina, 10, and 13-year-old daughter, Violet.

Although they're no longer together, they remain amicable and are often seen with their children and attending church as a family.

In 2017, Ben was in a relationship with SNL producer Lindsay Shookus, splitting the first time in August 2018.

He then went on to enjoy a high-profile romance with Playboy model Shauna Sexton which lasted only two months.

The candle that burns twice as bright: In 2018, Ben enjoyed a high-profile romance with Playboy model Shauna Sexton which lasted only two months. Seen together here in August

During their time together, Ben was admitted to rehab where he was treated for alcohol addiction.

After Sexton, Ben and Lindsay rekindled their romance, before splitting for good in April 2019.

Before his marriage to Jennifer, Ben was in a romance with his Gigli co-star Jennifer Lopez from 2002 to 2004.

Before that he romanced Gwyneth Paltrow for three years from 1997.
